evidence.claim: Fountain Health utilizes AWS cloud services for their infrastructure.
Fountain Health implements HIPAA compliance measures for all patient data management.
The platform supports integration with various Health Information Exchanges (HIEs) for smoother EHR interoperability.
Fountain Health is designed to work with FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Fountain Health employs secure data transfer protocols, adhering to X12 EDI standards for billing processes.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of alignment with X12 data exchange or clearinghouse capabilities.
